text: z   MC 1: Sustainable travel z   MC 2: Active travel and healthy streets z   MC 3: Impacts on the transport network z   MC4: Parking and permit-free z   MC5: Sustainable delivery, servicing, and construction MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY Tower Hamlets Local Plan 343 MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY Policy MC1 Sustainable travel 1. The council will promote the development of a healthy, safe, and environmentally friendly transport system that is inclusive, accessible, and affordable for all who live, work, study in, and visit the borough, in accordance with the latest guidance. Development proposals will therefore be expected to: a. ensure the primary mode of travel for short trips in the borough is focused on active travel modes, enabling more people to walk and cycle, in line with 15-minute city principles, by utilising a Healthy Streets Approach in the design and management of the development;
